title: Blackberry DTEK50 Case, CoverON [Explorer Series] Holster Hybrid Armor Belt Clip Hard Phone Cover For Blackberry DTEK50 Case - Black
feature: CoverON® [Explorer Series] hybrid case and belt clip holster combo for the Blackberry DTEK50
Made of a shockproof silicone inner layer and rigid polycarbonate outer layer
Dual layer heavy duty construction; full phone protection for your DTEK50
Both the case and belt clip have integrated kickstands; perfect hands free viewing of your phone
description: Guard against dings and drops.Made for those who are always on the move.Fold the case's kickstand out to go hands-free.Protect your phone screen.The series protective case and holster for the keeps your phone protected and always at your hip while you're on the go. Constantly reaching into your pockets when trying to answer a call just seems way too inconvenient. And not having a protective case on your phone is risky to say the least. Solve both these problems with the Explorer series case from CoverON. The case has two layers of protection: a flexible rubber inner skin and a tough hard outer shell. Combine the two and you get excellent shock and scratch resistance for the DTEK50. The holster has a spring hinged belt clip for secure positioning. Lock the clip into 13 different angles to keep your phone horizontal or vertical while in the holster. Fully customizable look and feel. Plus, as an added feature you can slide the kickstand out on the back of the case to use your phone hands-free. This is especially helpful once you get back to the office. Of course, we had one last detail to include. The holster is lined with a soft-feel felt to keep your phone screen scratch free when using your holster. As always, CoverON offers a 90 day manufacturer warranty.
